title: One Piece Episode #496 Review
author: Chris Beveridge
description: A review of Episode 496 focusing on Sabo's backstory revelation. The reviewer notes that while Sabo's background provides 'a superficial yet unsurprising explanation,' the episode succeeds in being 'light and fun that expands on the characters in small ways.' The reviewer appreciated shifting focus away from Ace and Luffy's tragedy.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Contains spoilers for Episode 496 and references to Ace's death in previous episodes

title: Anime Review: One Piece 494-496
author: Population GO
description: A review covering episodes 494-496, noting that the trio vows to become strong pirate captains. The blog discusses the character development and emotional moments in these flashback episodes.

title: 496: To the Sea Someday! the Pledge of the Three Brats!
author: Never Watched One Piece
description: A first-time watcher's recap of Episode 496, describing it as 'Another great episode' and noting 'the post-arc fatigue is wearing off.' The blogger appreciated 'the way Sabo's social status was revealed in small, hinting increments' and discusses Sabo as 'a tiny Sabo who loathes the privileged society of nobles within which he was raised.'

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: First-time watcher recap, no future spoilers

title: THESE 3 ARE THE BEST! - One Piece Episode 495 + 496 REACTION + REVIEW!
author: Unknown
description: A reaction video covering episodes 495 and 496, focusing on the emotional brotherhood moment between Ace, Sabo, and Luffy. The title emphasizes the reactor's appreciation for the three brothers.

title: THE THREE BROTHERS!!! | One Piece Ep. 495-496 REACTION
author: Unknown
description: A reaction video to episodes 495-496 highlighting the brotherhood formation between Luffy, Ace, and Sabo through the sakazuki ceremony.

title: THEY BECAME BROTHERS!!!! | One Piece Episodes 495-496 REACTION!!!
author: Unknown
description: An enthusiastic reaction video to episodes 495-496 focusing on the pivotal brotherhood ceremony moment. The all-caps title emphasizes the emotional impact of the sakazuki scene.

title: From Now On, WERE BROTHERS | One Piece Episode 495 AND 496 Live Reaction!
author: Unknown
description: A live reaction to episodes 495-496, with the title directly quoting the brotherhood declaration moment. Shows first-time watchers experiencing the sakazuki ceremony.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Live first-time reaction, no future spoilers

title: ONE PIECE EPISODE 496 REACTION!
author: According to Lucky
description: An exclusive Patreon reaction to Episode 496, focusing on Sabo's noble heritage reveal and the brotherhood ceremony.

title: One Piece Episode 496 UNCUT REACTION!
author: BOLDcast
description: An uncut Patreon-exclusive reaction to Episode 496, featuring extended commentary on Sabo's backstory and the brotherhood formation.
